Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.calc.config.ReportingRules

  • Packages that use ReportingRules 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.calc
    Calculate risk measures on trades, applies scenarios and manages market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.config
    Configuration types for the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner
    Types used when running calculations.

    • Uses of ReportingRules in com.opengamma.strata.calc

      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc that return ReportingRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReportingRules Column.getReportingRules()
      Gets the reporting rules that apply to this column in addition to the default rules.
      ReportingRules CalculationRules.getReportingRules()
      Gets the rules defining how calculation results should be reported.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetaProperty<ReportingRules> Column.Meta.reportingRules()
      The meta-property for the reportingRules property.
      MetaProperty<ReportingRules> CalculationRules.Meta.reportingRules()
      The meta-property for the reportingRules property.
      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc with parameters of type ReportingRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Column.Builder Column.Builder.reportingRules(ReportingRules reportingRules)
      Sets the reporting rules that apply to this column in addition to the default rules.
      CalculationRules.Builder CalculationRules.Builder.reportingRules(ReportingRules reportingRules)
      Sets the rules defining how calculation results should be reported.
      Column Column.withDefaultRules(PricingRules defaultPricingRules, MarketDataRules defaultMarketDataRules, ReportingRules defaultReportingRules)
      Returns a column whose rules are derived from the rules in this column composed with the default rules.

    • Uses of ReportingRules in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config

      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config that return ReportingRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default ReportingRules ReportingRules.composedWith(ReportingRules rule)
      Returns a rule that returns a currency from this rule if available, otherwise returning one from the other rule.
      static ReportingRules ReportingRules.empty()
      Returns an empty set of rules.
      static ReportingRules ReportingRules.fixedCurrency(Currency currency)
      Returns a rule that always returns the same reporting currency.
      ReportingRules CalculationTaskConfig.getReportingRules()
      Gets the rules for reporting the calculated values.
      static ReportingRules ReportingRules.of(ReportingRules... rules)
      Returns a rule that tries each of the delegate rules in turn and returns the first currency it finds.
      static ReportingRules ReportingRules.payLegCurrency()
      Returns a rule that uses the target's pay leg currency as the reporting currency.
      static ReportingRules ReportingRules.receiveLegCurrency()
      Returns a rule that uses the target's receive leg currency as the reporting currency.
      static ReportingRules ReportingRules.targetCurrency()
      Returns a rule that uses the target's primary currency as the reporting currency.
      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config that return types with arguments of type ReportingRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetaProperty<ReportingRules> CalculationTaskConfig.Meta.reportingRules()
      The meta-property for the reportingRules property.
      Methods in com.opengamma.strata.calc.config with parameters of type ReportingRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default ReportingRules ReportingRules.composedWith(ReportingRules rule)
      Returns a rule that returns a currency from this rule if available, otherwise returning one from the other rule.
      static CalculationTaskConfig CalculationTaskConfig.of(CalculationTarget target, int rowIndex, int columnIndex, FunctionConfig functionConfig, Map<String,Object> functionArguments, MarketDataMappings marketDataMappings, ReportingRules reportingRules)
      Returns configuration for a task that will calculate a value for a target.
      static ReportingRules ReportingRules.of(ReportingRules... rules)
      Returns a rule that tries each of the delegate rules in turn and returns the first currency it finds.
      CalculationTaskConfig.Builder CalculationTaskConfig.Builder.reportingRules(ReportingRules reportingRules)
      Sets the rules for reporting the calculated values.

      Constructors in com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner with parameters of type ReportingRules 
      Constructor and Description
